lead_paragraph: A day after saying their friendship was “completely dead,” Thomas Bjorn apologized yesterday to Ian Woosnam, the European Ryder Cup captain. Bjorn reacted Monday after Woosnam overlooked him and selected Darren Clarke and Lee Westwood with his captain’s picks. Ten other players made the team automatically for the Sept. 22-24 matches against the United States at the K Club near Dublin. Bjorn was fined by the European Tour for his comments.
